objects.description: [Mustang Panda](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0129) has searched the entire target system for DOC, DOCX, PPT, PPTX, XLS, XLSX, and PDF files.(Citation: Avira Mustang Panda January 2020)(Citation: Palo Alto Unit42 STATELY TAURUS TONESHELL September 2023)
